summary: Comprehensive testing of admin login authentication flow completed. All authentication features are working perfectly - login, logout, error handling, and protected routes are functioning correctly.
passed_tests: Login API returns 200 status with valid token
Successful redirect to /admin dashboard after login
Token, userData, and userType stored correctly in localStorage
Error handling with wrong credentials (401 response)
Error toast notification for failed login
Protected route access control (redirects to login when not authenticated)
Admin dashboard UI loads correctly with success indicators
action_item_for_main_agent:

✅ Error handling for wrong credentials
✅ Logout functionality working
✅ Protected routes working
